title: Two world records fall at the World Athletics Indoor Championships
text: Monday, March 4, 2024  Athletics Related articles 14 October 2019: Kenya's Brigid Kosgei sets new world record at Chicago Marathon 13 October 2019: Eliud Kipchoge of Kenya runs marathon under two hours 1 October 2019: Norway's Warholm wins gold in 400 m hurdles at World Championships in Doha 17 November 2016: Bolt to train with Borussia Dortmund 12 August 2013: Dibaba’s comeback: Long-distance track star wins her first World Championship title since 2007 Collaborate! Pillars of Wikinews writing Writing an article Last weekend, two world records were set at the 2024 World Athletics Indoor Championships in Glasgow, Scotland. After Femke Bol broke the 400 metres short track record on Saturday, Devynne Charlton broke her 60 metres hurdles world record on the final day of the championships Sunday, as the United States topped the medal tables in a good sign for American hopes at the 2024 Olympic Games. The World Athletics Indoor Championships is the highest-level global indoor competition, typically held once every two years. The U.S. topped the global medal tables at the preceding indoor and outdoor championships. Indoor athletics is much like its outdoor equivalent contested at the Olympics, but the track oval is half the size (200 m compared to 400 m outdoors), with banked turns to compensate for the tighter curves. Rather than contesting straight events like the 100 metres on the perimetre, indoor tracks have a 60-metre straightaway in the center of the track where sprint and hurdles events are contested. Although the World Indoor Championships doesn't directly qualify athletes for the Olympics this summer, if the athletes run, jump, or throw far or fast enough at these championships, they can improve their World Athletics Ranking or hit qualifying standards that will make it easier for them to make their countries' national teams this summer. Though most Olympic athletics competitors compete in indoor track and field meets from January to March in preparation for the outdoor season over the summer, not all top Olympic athletes competed at World Indoors this year. 400 metres hurdles world record holder Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone typically doesn't run a full indoor season, preferring to race sparingly only two or three times outside the necessary Olympic qualification meetings. Likewise, reigning 100 metres world champion Sha'Carri Richardson doesn't usually run the shorter 60 metres indoor distance, choosing instead to wait until after the indoor season is over. Exactly one year ago, Aleia Hobbs would have been considered a clear favorite to win the women's 60 metres world title. Her time of 6.94 seconds at the 2023 USA Indoor Track and Field Championships remains the American record, making her the second-fastest performer of all time over the shortest athletics championship distance. Though she lagged behind leader Ewa Swoboda in qualifiers, she still had a good chance to claim her first senior international gold medal going in to the finals. Just as the athletes were set to begin, before the starting pistol was raised disaster struck as Hobbs clutched her leg in pain. This came after Hobbs was seen limping after her semi-final, telling Citius Mag, "It was a little rough. I had to get going. I don’t know. My legs feel heavy for some reason, but we got that one out of the way". The race was delayed by several minutes as a medic approached Hobbs, and ultimately she was escorted off the track in a wheelchair leaving an empty lane in the finals. She later posted on X, "Yea I'm good, I was just cramping up bad". Not to be distracted, reigning 2023 NCAA Division I Indoor Track and Field Championships winner Julien Alfred took advantage of Hobbs' absence to win the first ever Indoor Championships medal of any color for Saint Lucia. She had to out-lean Poland's Ewa Swoboda at the line, winning by 0.02 seconds in a time of 6.98. The men's 60 metres was set to be a match race between reigning 2023 World Athletics Championships 100 metres winner Noah Lyles and 60 metres world record holder Christian Coleman. Despite the slow-starting Lyles running down Coleman at the U.S. championships, Coleman had the faster time in the semi-finals earlier on Friday, making for an anticipated match-up. Coleman burst out of the starting blocks in typical fashion, with Lyles far behind 20 metres in. Though Lyles made up significant ground in the final 40 metres, it was not enough as Coleman won his second World Indoor title and Lyles had to settle for silver. Before this February, Susanna Kallur's 7.68 60 metres hurdles record had stood since 2008 uncontested. But now, in just one month, it's been broken three times, by two different athletes. First at the 2024 Millrose Games in New York City last Saturday, Devynne Charlton of the Bahamas broke the mark by 0.01 seconds with a 7.67 clocking. Then at the 2024 USA Indoor Track and Field Championships during the 60 m hurdles semi-finals, American Tia Jones equaled Charlton's newly-minted record. With Jones withdrawing from World Indoors due to injury, the stage was set for Charlton to reclaim her un-tied world record. Charlton delivered, running 7.65 in the finals to break the tie and cement herself as the fastest-ever short hurdler. She beat the defending champion Cyréna Samba-Mayela by nearly a full tenth of a second, as Pia Skrzyszowska was happy to walk away with the bronze. Though Charlton won her first global gold medal in Glasgow, in the men's race Grant Holloway was aiming for his fifth. Holloway was already an established world-beater in athletics, and he had run close to his 2021 7.29-second mark on several occasions before breaking it at the U.S. Championships last month in 7.27. Maintaining one of the longest-ever winning streaks in athletics, Holloway beat the field by 0.14 seconds to win his 63rd-straight 60 metres hurdles race since his last loss in 2014. His time of 7.29 seconds was just off his new record, giving Holloway all four of the four-fastest marks of all time in his event. The story of the World Athletics Championship last year was Dutch athlete Femke Bol, who tripped and fell ten metres from the finish to ruin a potential world record and win in the mixed 4 × 400 m relay but then came back to win both the 400 m hurdles and the women's 4 × 400 in a show of redemption. In Glasgow this weekend, Bol didn't give up any ground as she led wire-to-wire to win the women's 400 metres in a new world record of 49.17 seconds, breaking her own mark from the Dutch Indoor Athletics Championships last month. After the race, Bol told World Athletics, "My coach said to me, 'You can run faster,' but to be honest I just wanted to win." Bol's countrywoman Lieke Klaver took the silver medal in a 1-2 sweep for the Netherlands. A much less certain winner came in the men's race, as Alexander Doom of Belgium beat pre-race favorite and 400 metres hurdles record-holder Karsten Warholm. After Warholm crossed 200 m in a quick 21.30, Doom passed the Norwegian on the final bend to pull off the upset victory. "It's amazing. I never expected this, because we didn't really have this in our sights", Doom later said. In the two 4 × 400 metres relay races at the end of the championships, Bol and Doom backed up their individual titles with team victories, both running on the anchor legs for their countries. Doom's race was particularly significant as 2023 World Athlete of the Year Noah Lyles ran for the U.S. team on third leg, maintaining the U.S. lead but not putting enough distance ahead of the Belgian team to fend off Doom from taking the lead on the final bend again. Lyles, typically a 60 m to 200 m runner who did not run in the relay rounds, admitted his reasoning to run the relay finals was to convince USA Track and Field to select him for the Olympic 4 × 400 and give himself a chance to win four gold medals. His selection did not come without controversy as rival Fred Kerley tweeted, "@usatf y’all play that favoritism like mf. Yall like puppets. For sure yes man [...] Man I tell you last 3 year we been asking to be in that ish f*** that Olympic storyline s*** yall puppets no in between either". Lyles responded after the team's runner-up finish, "He could be here, but he ain't [...] If he mad at that, come on out here". The United Kingdom has a habit of overperforming for home-town championships – despite winning zero gold medals at the last two non-UK world indoor championships in the U.S. and in Serbia, Andrew Pozzi and Katarina Johnson-Thompson stepped up to win two gold medals the last time the U.K. hosted World Indoors six years ago in Birmingham. This tradition continued last weekend as Josh Kerr and Molly Caudery won their first global indoor titles in the 3000 metres and pole vault respectively for the home-town crowd. Though Kerr had established himself as a global force by upsetting Jakob Ingebrigtsen at the 2023 World Championships 1500 m, despite his two miles world record at the 2024 Millrose Games he had yet to prove himself in a tactical 3000 m competition. After Olin Hacker pushed the pace mid-race, Kerr took a late lead and stretched out the field enough to prevent U.S. mile record-holder Yared Nuguse from out-kicking him in the final lap. Rather than fly the traditional Union Jack flag, Kerr, a Scotland native, picked up a Scottish flag from a fan during his victory lap. The other U.K. victory came from Molly Caudery, who upset reigning Olympic champion Katie Moon to win the women's pole vault. Caudery only missed once at 4.75 m and once at 4.80 m before clearing both heights and failing all her attempts at 4.85 m, which gave her a better record than Eliza McCartney and Moon who settled for silver and bronze respectively. The final took more than two hours to complete, as Margot Chevrier suffered an ankle injury that unexpectedly paused competition, but this delay only served to heighten the crowd response as Caudery's victory was confirmed just 34 minutes after Kerr's victory. title: Herbert Wigwe, CEO of Access Bank Plc dies at 57
text: Friday, February 9, 2024  Nigeria Related articles 3 March 2023: Electoral commission declares Bola Tinubu victor in Nigerian presidential election 19 March 2022: Bandit ringleader arrested in Nigeria 10 July 2019: Benin, Nigeria join African Union continental free trade bloc 1 July 2018: FIFA World Cup 2018 day 12, 13, 14, 15: Iran, Nigeria, Germany, Senegal out of the tournament 27 June 2018: FIFA World Cup 2018 day eight, nine, ten, eleven: Belgium, England confirm knockout phase qualification; Poland, Costa Rica miss out Last 16 Location of Nigeria Collaborate! Pillars of Wikinews writing Writing an article The CEO of Access Bank Plc, Herbert Wigwe died in an helicopter crash on February 9, 2024. He died in an helicopter at California, US with the plane boarding the wife and children. The Helicopter EC130B4 on Friday was carrying six passengers including two crew members before the crash at a border town between California and Nevada According to Punch Newspaper, A United States of America aviation lawyer by name Robert A. Clifford reportedly said has said, ".. The tragic helicopter crash that claimed the lives of the Group Chief Executive Officer of Access Holdings, Herbert Wigwe, and other prominent Nigerians in California on Friday could have been averted. Wigwe was married to Chizoba Wigwe (née Nwuba) and had four children. Access Bank's parent company, Access Corporation, has been listed on the Nigerian Stock Exchange since 1998 and has over 900,000 shareholders. As at 31 March 2022, Access Bank had total assets of approximately US $28.8 billion. The company is set to be taken over by CFO Seyi Kumapayi. Also, the stock is also to be placed on the New York Stock Exchange in his honor. He was 57 years old. Oluwakemi Abimbola. "Flying Wigwe, others in bad weather wrong – US aviation lawyer" — Punch Newspaper, 15 February, 2024 Lipika Pelham. title: Jacques Cameron Launches Legacy Artists
text: Friday, February 16, 2024  Jacques Cameron announced the launch of entertainment studio and production company Legacy Artists which will produce and distribute movies, television, games, books, and interactive entertainment to audiences worldwide. Legacy Artists business segments include movies and television, music, games, publishing, licensed consumer products, as well as new services and technologies for movie theaters, theme parks, live event venues, social media and electronics. The company is responsible for content production of a diverse array of entertainment products, services, and experiences based on Legacy Artists owned brands and the company's own library of original entertainment titles and franchises. Legacy Artists headquarters will be in Los Angeles, California located at Century Plaza Towers in Century City and the 2500 Broadway media campus in Santa Monica which has also been the offices of Roku, Hulu and HBO. Jacques Cameron is the founder, chief executive office, and sole stakeholder in the company and its assets. The studio's current projects include several in development and in production including a feature film due for U.S. release in 2024. The Legacy Artists official fanfare soundtrack was performed and recorded by the Czech National Symphony Orchestra live in Prague, Czech Republic. "The vision is to deliver exciting and immersive experiences to audiences that leave an indelible mark that will last", Cameron said. Have an opinion on this story? Share it! title: Lawrence, Massachusetts man dies in crash on Interstate 495 in Westford
text: Saturday, February 17, 2024  A three vehicle crash kills a Lawrence, Massachusetts man in Westford. At about 6 pm the crash happened on Interstate 495. Massachusetts State Police troopers were called to the scene of the crash. Police said a tractor-trailer went over a pickup truck Thursday evening. The cause of the crash is being looked into. A preliminary investigation is underway. The pickup truck overturned and became wedged under the tractor-trailer, Procopio said. The driver of the pickup truck, a 26-year-old Lawrence man, died in the crash. The other two drivers were not injured, Procopio said. The crash remains under investigation.The crash involved a tractor-trailer that struck a 2022 Toyota Tacoma pickup truck, police said. First responders tried to safely extricate the driver of the Toyota, a 26-year-old Lawrence man.He was pronounced dead at the scene, police said. His identity had not been released as of Friday afternoon. The drivers of the other two vehicles were not injured. Police believe that the crash occurred when a 2012 Volkswagen EOS traveling in the right lane struck the front-right section of a 2014 Freightliner tractor-trailer that was traveling in the middle lane. The Toyota was traveling nearby in the same direction as the other two vehicles. Please stay with WikiNews as we give breaking updates every hour on the hour. Have an opinion on this story? Share it! title: Russian photographer Viktor Pinchuk presents exhibition “Street Sketches” of Exotic Countries
text: Saturday, February 17, 2024  On February 16, 2024, Russian Wikinews attended Russian photographer Viktor Pinchuk's last exhibition in Sevastopol, Crimea. The project was conceived and implemented in a virtual format; this is already the second experience of using the new method by a Crimean resident. And the organizer was the Sevastopol Center for Culture and Arts. The exhibition, which included material collected over almost twenty years of travel and long expeditions around the planet, was called Street Sketches ((ru))Russian language: ‍Уличные зарисовки ((ru)) which quite accurately reflects its content. Scenes from the life of aborigines from distant countries of Africa, Asia, Latin America and Oceania, were captured by the author, who by chance found himself in the right place at the right time. The event was held in the premises of the People's Photo Club "Brig". The audience were mostly photographers, which made it possible to more accurately and professionally evaluate the works of the creator of the exhibition. Pinchuk commented on each of the photographs, as if temporarily moving the participants of the event into another, partly parallel world, enveloping them in an exotic atmosphere of distant travels through little-known corners of the globe that not everyone is destined to visit. title: Body of missing 11 year old girl from Texas found, Police say
text: Thursday, February 29, 2024  The body of an 11 year old girl from Texas was found on Tuesday, according to Polk County Sheriff Byron Lyons. As we told you in a previous article, 11-year-old Audrii Cunningham left her home, where she was last seen, on her way to school, but never made it to the bus stop. "Audrii's body was located at the Trinity River," Lyons told WikiNews at a Tuesday news conference. The divers who found the body say they were "deeply saddened". WikiNews cannot confirm or deny who the killer was, but police say a friend of Audrii's father who lived on the family property, Don Steven McDougal, was charged Wednesday with capital murder in her death. Audrii Cunningham lived with her family in a lakeside community on the eastern shores of Livingston Lake. Lyons said that investigators were able to zero in on the location of Audrii's body using cellphone records, videos and some information they received from McDougal. Investigators say was killed by a family friend, died from "homicidal violence including blunt head trauma," according to the Harris County medical examiner's office records. Audrii's mother, Cassie Matthews, said during the memorial that her pain has left her at a loss for words. She described her daughter as “perfection.” “I'm truly blessed to have given birth to such an amazing little girl,” the mother said. No funerals have been concluded as of February 26, 2024. As soon as we get more updates, we will bring them to you as soon as we can. Please stay with WikiNews as we give breaking updates every hour on the hour. Have an opinion on this story? title: Rishi Sunak's North Wales Levelling Up Expedition
text: Friday, February 23, 2024  Rishi Sunak's North Wales Levelling Up Expedition: To Spread Opportunity, Create Jobs and Revitalized Local Communities Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is on a Levelling Up tour in North Wales includes a meeting with engineers in Anglesey to observe the UK Government's efforts in rolling out faster and more reliable broadband. The two-day tour involves interactions with communities and businesses in the region. The UK Government's recent announcement indicates that over one million homes, businesses, and public buildings can now access top-tier internet speeds due to government investment. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak emphasizes the Levelling Up initiative's goal of providing better opportunities for work, travel, and local pride. The upgrade of one million premises with high-speed gigabit broadband aligns with the government's long-term plan to connect people, businesses, and regions across the entire United Kingdom. The efforts aim to breathe new life into North Wales communities through enhanced connectivity, the establishment of a new freeport, increased funding for high streets, and a £1 billion investment in North Wales rail. title: Six countries led by the U.S. and U.K. on Saturday made aircraft missile strikes against the Houthis in Yemen
text: Saturday, February 24, 2024  Politics and conflicts Related articles 25 February 2024: Sandile Rekhotso 4 January 2024: Ukrainian missile and drone strike in Russia kills at least 21 people 3 January 2024: Margrethe II, Queen of Denmark, announces abdication 25 December 2023: Wikinews interviews Tatton Spiller, founder of political news service Simple Politics 26 November 2023: Former U.S. First Lady Rosalynn Carter dies at 96 Collaborate! Pillars of Wikinews writing Writing an article The US and UK among other countries made aircraft missile strikes against the Huthi in Yemen on Saturday at 11:50 pm, Sanaa Yemen time. The Huthi fighters have been attacking ships in the Red Sea. The eight countries made 18 targeted attacks in Yemen against the Huthi. Australia, Bahrain, Canada, Denmark, the Netherlands and New Zealand contributed with the help of the US and UK on strikes to Yemen on Saturday. US President Joe Biden has said they will not put up with attacks on shipping in the Red Sea. US Pentagon spokeswoman Sabrina Singh told reporters that the threat of the Huthi attacks are still strong. Early on Saturday, the destroyer USS Mason struck an anti-ship ballistic missile from Huthi areas in Yemen towards the Gulf of Aden. The missile was probably targeting MV Torm Thor, a US-flagged, owned, and operated chemical and oil tanker. The Bab AI-Mandeb Strait has been another Huthi target. On the USS Mason and MV Torm Thor no injuries were reported. U.S. F/A-18's were launched from the USS Dwight D. Eisenhower. The US Navy reports it hasn't operated at this pace "since at least the Tanker War of the ’80s."[1] Have an opinion on this story? Share it! Luis Martinez and Meghan Mistry. title: PRESTANEWSNETWORK.COM
text: Ta Stanley: Preserving Pokomo Folklore and Promoting Environmentalism Early Life and Background Ta Stanley, a prominent figure among the Pokomo people, has devoted his life to expressing emotions through the rich tapestry of Pokomo music. Hailing from the Pokomo community, known for their vibrant cultural heritage, Ta Stanley has become a torchbearer of Pokomo folklore. M usical Legacy The Pokomo people, under Ta Stanley's influence, express their emotions through music, with one notable cultural gem being 'Nimpa Yukombe.' This melodic masterpiece captures the true essence of happiness, boasting vibrant vocals, rhythmic claps, and lively drumbeats. Beyond being a mere song, 'Nimpa Yukombe' unfolds as a shared experience, inviting listeners to immerse themselves in the jubilation it embodies. Cultural Significance Ta Stanley's contribution goes beyond music; he has positioned 'Nimpa Yukombe' as a cultural emblem, acting as a bridge that unites people from diverse backgrounds. Through this musical expression, he fosters unity and shared experiences among individuals from various cultures within the country. Environmental Stewardship Beyond his musical prowess, Ta Stanley is recognized as an environmentalist. With a profound understanding of the interconnectedness between culture and the environment, he actively advocates for environmental conservation. His efforts align with the traditional Pokomo values that emphasize a harmonious relationship with nature. Tour Guide and Cultural Ambassador Ta Stanley extends his influence beyond the musical realm. As a seasoned tour guide, he offers an immersive experience, introducing visitors to the rich tapestry of Pokomo culture. His performances, such as the captivating wedding performance in Mombasa, serve as windows into the vibrant traditions of the Pokomo people. Legacy and Recognition Ta Stanley's dedication to preserving Pokomo folklore, promoting environmental awareness, and acting as a cultural ambassador has garnered him recognition and respect. His contributions have not only enriched the cultural landscape of the Pokomo people but have also transcended borders, creating bridges of understanding among diverse communities in Kenya. title: Karaciğer Ağrısının Nedenleri ve Tedavi Yöntemleri
text: Karaciğer ağrısı, genellikle bir dizi sağlık sorununun bir belirtisi olarak ortaya çıkar. Ancak, karaciğer ağrısının temel nedenlerini anlamak, etkili bir tedavi yaklaşımı geliştirmek için kritiktir. Karaciğer Enfeksiyonları, özellikle hepatit, karaciğer ağrısına neden olabilir. Ayrıca, Yağlı Karaciğer Hastalığı, karaciğerde yağ birikimine bağlı olarak ortaya çıkan bir durum olup, ağrıya yol açabilir. Alkol tüketimi, karaciğer sağlığını ciddi şekilde etkileyebilir. Aşırı alkol kullanımı, karaciğerin normal fonksiyonlarını bozabilir ve Alkolik Karaciğer Hastalığı'na yol açabilir. Bu durum da karaciğer ağrısına neden olabilir. İçki alışkanlıklarınızı gözden geçirmek, karaciğer sağlığınızı korumak için önemli bir adım olabilir. Viral hepatit, özellikle hepatit B ve C, karaciğerde iltihaplanmaya neden olabilir. Bu iltihaplanma da karaciğer ağrısına yol açabilir. Tedavi edilmeyen hepatit durumları, karaciğer hasarına ve ağrısına sebep olabilir. Bu nedenle, düzenli sağlık kontrolleri ve gerekirse aşılarla korunma önemlidir. 1. İlaç Tedavisi Karaciğer ağrısının tedavisinde kullanılan ilaçlar, genellikle inflamasyonu azaltmaya ve ağrıyı kontrol etmeye odaklanır. Doktor gözetiminde kullanılan anti-enflamatuar ilaçlar ve ağrı kesiciler, karaciğer ağrısının hafifletilmesine yardımcı olabilir. 2. Diyet Değişiklikleri Karaciğer sağlığını iyileştirmek için beslenme alışkanlıklarınızı gözden geçirmek önemlidir. Düşük yağlı ve sağlıklı bir diyet, karaciğerinize gereken destek sağlayabilir. Özellikle, yeşil sebzeler, meyveler ve tam tahıllar içeren bir diyet, karaciğer fonksiyonlarını olumlu yönde etkileyebilir. 3. Egzersiz ve Sağlıklı Yaşam Tarzı Düzenli egzersiz, karaciğer sağlığını destekleyebilir. Fiziksel aktivite, kan dolaşımını artırarak karaciğerin daha etkili çalışmasına katkıda bulunabilir. Ayrıca, sigara içmemek ve alkol tüketimini sınırlamak da karaciğer ağrısını azaltmada önemli adımlardır. 4. Profesyonel Tıbbi Yardım Karaciğer ağrısı ciddi bir sorun olduğunda, profesyonel tıbbi yardım önemlidir. Doktorunuz, ağrının temel nedenini belirlemek ve etkili bir tedavi planı oluşturmak için gerekli testleri yapacaktır. Tedavi sürecinde doktorunuza düzenli olarak bilgi vermek, sağlığınızı en iyi şekilde korumanıza yardımcı olabilir. Karaciğer ağrısı, çeşitli nedenlere bağlı olarak ortaya çıkabilen bir durumdur. Doğru tanı ve etkili tedavi ile, karaciğer sağlığınızı koruyabilir ve ağrıyı hafifletebilirsiniz. Sağlıklı yaşam tarzı, dengeli beslenme, düzenli egzersiz ve profesyonel tıbbi destek, karaciğer ağrısının yönetilmesinde önemli rol oynar. Yazar Haber. "Karaciğer Nerededir, Karaciğer Ağrısının Belirtileri ve Tedavi Yöntemleri Nelerdir?" — Yazar Haber, 26.02.2024

title: Man beat woman to death with ceramic toilet cover in Washington hotel, police say
text: A man who admitted to choking and beating a woman with whom he was in a “nonexclusive romantic relationship” was charged with first-degree murder, Washington D.C. police said. Romaine Maddox, 36, was found dead at the Ivy City Hotel in Washington D.C. at around 11:20 a.m. on Friday. Investigators said Maddox had multiple lacerations, deformities in her head and blunt-force trauma, according to court documents. Surveillance video revealed Maddox checked into the hotel with William Barrett, 59, at 7:20 p.m. Thursday. Barrett told investigators he had been in a “nonexclusive romantic relationship” with Maddox for a year. Police arrested Barrett on Friday on suspicion of homicide. Court documents state the officer who arrested Barrett saw blood on his head and face. Once Barrett was arrested, police seized his boxers, cell phone, two pairs of gloves and the suspect's shoestring as evidence. All of which had apparent blood on them, according to court records. "She was running her mouth and hit me," Berrett told the police. In response, Berrett told police he choked Maddox with his belt, which was also seized as evidence. "Barrett displayed how he accomplished this by elaborating through hand gestures that he approached the decedent from the rear while she was face down on the ground and got on top of her," states court documents. "Defendant Barrett stated that he thought he killed her at that point." He was surprised when she began crying for help. The court document states he hit her with a closed fist to silence her. He then became "irate," and hit her face several times with the ceramic lid of the hotel room's toilet. Documents state the ceramic toilet bowl cover was broken into multiple pieces. Timeline According to court documents, this is the chain of events that was captured on CCTV from the hotel before Maddox's body was discovered Friday morning: Thursday, 7:20 p.m.: The couple was seen checking into the hotel, the night before Maddox's body was discovered. 10:21 p.m.: Maddox leaves the room completely naked and is locked out for four minutes before going back inside. Friday, 1:06 a.m.: No one is seen leaving or entering the room until a pillow is thrown out of it. Maddox leans out and brings it back into the room. 1:16 a.m.: The victim walks out only wearing a pair of underwear. A few minutes later, Barrett walks out completely naked to see where she went. 1:20 a.m.: Maddox walks back into the room. 2:17 a.m.: The suspect is seen throwing the victim's clothes and shoes out the door. 2:19 a.m.: A female voice is heard saying, "Get off me!" and "Help." 9:07 a.m.: No one is seen leaving or entering the room until Barrett steps out the door, alone. 11:09 a.m.: A hotel employee enters the room and leaves abruptly. 11:20 a.m.: Police were called to the hotel, and they found Maddox unconscious and not breathing. 11:28 a.m.: The victim was pronounced dead after DC Fire and EMS were called to the scene and found no signs of life. Please stay with WikiNews as we bring breaking updates every hour on the hour.

title: Josè DeLeoñ
text: Monday, February 26, 2024  José DeLeón, a major league pitcher for 13 seasons who led the National League in strikeouts for the St. Louis Cardinals in 1989, has died. He was 63. DeLeón was 86-119 with a 3.76 ERA in 264 starts and 151 relief appearances for the Pittsburgh Pirates (1983-86), Chicago White Sox (1986-87, 1993-95), St. Louis (1988-92), Philadelphia Phillies (1992-93) and Montreal Expos (1995). The right-hander struck out 1,594 in 1,897⅓ innings. He topped the NL with 201 strikeouts in 1989 and tied for the NL lead with 19 losses in 1985 and 1990. Selected by the Pirates in the third round of the 1979 amateur draft, DeLeón made his major league debut on July 23, 1983, striking out nine over eight innings in a 5-2 win over visiting San Francisco. DeLeón finished 7-3 with a 2.83 ERA in 15 starts and was seventh in voting for NL Rookie of the Year, an award won by the New York Mets' Darryl Strawberry. DeLeón was traded to the White Sox in July 1986 for Bobby Bonilla, who earned four consecutive All-Star Game selections with Pittsburgh from 1988 to 1991. DeLeón made his only postseason appearances in 1993, allowing one run over 4⅔ innings in a pair of AL Championship Series relief appearances against the Toronto Blue Jays. https://www.espn.com/mlb/story/_/id/39604817/jose-deleon-mlb-pitcher-13-seasons-dies-age-63 |José DeLeón, MLB pitcher for 13 seasons, dies at age 63 ESPN ESPN

title: Trump's next trial scheduled for 2025
text: has just learned that Former President Donald Trump's next trial has been scheduled for 2025, after the election is over. Trump has tried to delay the trials against him until after the 2024 election, particularly given that in the federal cases against him, getting reelected would mean he could appoint prosecutors willing to drop the charges against him. Trump is no longer wealthy enough to be included in the list of the Top 10 Most Wealthy,The New York Times's annual ranking of America's richest individuals, although he remains a billionaire with assets valued at $2.6 billion as of February 2024, the newspaper estimates. is still not sure of the cause, but we believe that it is because of some of his most recent fines. A judge recently fined Donald Trump more than $350 million, baring him from running businesses in N.Y. for three years. The state AG's office said that when factoring in pre-judgment interest, the amount exceeds $450 million. Trump said on Friday night that he would appeal.

title: Officer Charged For Double-Crash
text: Saturday, January 22, 2011  Police Constable Kerry Smith, 24, has been charged with two counts of causing death by dangerous driving over a crash last year in Luton, UK. PC Smith was based in the town at the time and works for Bedfordshire Police. Smith is accused in the June 4 deaths of Reda Lecheheb and Sidali Melal on Leagrave Road. Both were pedestrians. The crash was investigated by the Independent Police Complaints Commission (IPCC). The IPCC said yesterday that Smith will appear before St Albans Magistrates' Court on February 9. title: After nearly two month long investigation, man arrested on drug charges near elementary school in North Carolina
text: Wednesday, February 28, 2024  Iverson Ward was arrested Tuesday near an elementary school for drug related charges in Kinston, North Carolina. The police department said his apartment was near Northeast Elementary School and Greene Lamp Head Start Daycare. Ward was charged with six drug charges, said the Kinston Police Department. The Violent Crime Action Team was called with complaints of Ward with drugs in January of this year. Ward was arrested and charged with PWISD within 1,000 feet of a school PWISD within 1,000 feet of a childcare center PWISD schedule VI Felony possession of schedule VI Felony maintaining a dwelling Possession of drug paraphernalia. No bond information was released. Investigators executed a search warrant at his apartment at 912 East Highland Avenue. Investigators said that 334 grams of edibles and marijuana were found. title: Music producer J Merlin talks about imprisonment to positive life
text: Thursday, February 29, 2024  On 24th February 2015, 5.30pm J Merlin whose real name is Jeffrey Pereira-Ogbekhilu was arrested in Peckham, Nigel Road, for firearms. He was taken to Woolwich Crown Court for sentencing, he received a custodial sentence of 5 years in which he will do half of the sentence in prison and the rest on probation. After his imprisonment he learnt his lesson and got back into making music saying, “I used to think there was no hope but there is hope for everyone.” J Merlin started to make progress in 2019 after working on multiple songs with various artists and features including Lancey Foux on the song Waves. J Merlin has an inspiring story of redemption. After serving time in prison for possession of a firearm, he turned his life around through music production. Growing up in Camberwell and Peckham, music was always part of his background. Despite facing challenges and associating with the wrong crowd, he discovered his talent for producing music and remains to stay focused on his gift. His journey serves as a reminder that there is hope for everyone, even difficult circumstances. Have an opinion on this story? Share it! Isabel Ramirez. "‘There is hope for everyone’ – Camberwell ex-offender turned his life around by making music" — Southwark News, January 11, 2024 Alix Culberston. title: "Boyfriend" video, in seconds, reaches magnitude of last year's quake
text: Thursday, May 3, 2012 , at 19:50:15 EDT (23:50:15 UTC) On Thursday evening, at this very second in time, the age of Justin Bieber's newest video, "Boyfriend", in seconds, reached 9.1, the magnitude of last year's Japan earthquake. It has now also been three seconds since the video's first comment. At six seconds, this video holds the record for the shortest time it has taken for a newly uploaded music video to get its first comment. The earthquake occurred in Japan on March 11, 2011, killing 19,759 people, injuring 6,242, and leaving over 2,500 people missing, and causing $360 billion in damages. The importance of a number depends largely on its context. While the number nine is innocent in some contexts, such as the ninth comment on a video or the ninth turn of a Mario Party game, this number is quite severe in the context of earthquake magnitudes, where magnitudes one and two are too weak to be felt, fours and fives are a daily occurrence, and nines and tens are damaging to a historic degree. In 2010 and the first half of 2011, many music videos were uploaded to YouTube and temporarily unlisted or private until a scheduled release time. For example, Jessie J's "Price Tag" was uploaded on January 25, 2011, but it got no views until January 29, 2011, four days later. Train's "Marry Me" had the longest "waiting period" of all 2010 videos, uploaded on December 12, 2010, unavailable until January 3, 2011, a gap of 22 days. The Wanted's "Glad You Came" from last summer had the second longest waiting period, coming in at nineteen days. It was posted on August 11, 2011, but it was unavailable until August 30, 2011. Starting in June 2011, Vevo carried out vital changes. First, videos, going forward, will not have waiting periods. What this means is that the moment that a new music video goes public is precisely the moment that the video was posted to YouTube. Waiting periods are now a thing of the past. Second, from now on, most music videos are uploaded on the hour. Lately, most Vevo videos are uploaded on the hour, with 3:00 a.m. Eastern Time (midnight Pacific Time) being the most common. Pitbull's "Rain Over Me", Usher's "Without You", Train's "Drive By", and Calvin Harris' "Feel So Close" were all uploaded at 3 a.m. Eastern Time. All of these videos got their first comments within an hour after being uploaded. "Glad You Came" was one of the few times Vevo broke its "resolution" after making this mid-year resolution in June 2011. Not all 2010 videos had waiting periods, however. Justin Bieber's "Baby" was uploaded on February 19, 2010, at 03:16:34 EST (08:16:34 UTC), and as soon as the video was uploaded, it was possible to view it on YouTube and leave comments on it. And people did. It got its first comment at 03:19:57, only three minutes and twenty-three seconds (203 seconds) after upload. As of this writing, "Baby" is the most viewed video on YouTube, with over 732 million views to date. But even in a year where many music videos had waiting periods, this is not the fastest "first comment" in 2010. Nine months later, Justin released "Pray" on the week after Thanksgiving. Tuesday, November 30, 2010, at 11:41:45, to be exact. Unlike most 2010 videos, "Pray", like its predecessor, "Baby", was viewable immediately. It got its first comment at 11:43:20, only a minute and a half after upload. Jason Derulo's "Ridin' Solo" was uploaded on May 3, 2010, at 11:26:15 (happy second birthday to that video, by the way). This video, which currently has 65 million views, had its first comment at 11:27:14, when it was only 59 seconds old. Here are some other speedy "first comments" of music videos in recent memory. All times are in Eastern Time. Britney Spears - "I Wanna Go" (uploaded: June 22, 2011, 03:00:00; first comment: June 22, 2011, 03:00:24) [24 seconds] Demi Lovato - "Skyscraper" (uploaded: July 14, 2011, 19:00:00; first comment: July 14, 2011, 19:00:36) [36 seconds] Pitbull - "Rain Over Me" (uploaded: July 22, 2011, 03:00:00; first comment: July 22, 2011, 03:01:22) [82 seconds] One Direction - "What Makes You Beautiful" (uploaded: August 19, 2011, 11:00:00; first comment: August 19, 2011, 11:00:37) [37 seconds] Jessie J - "Domino" (uploaded: December 26, 2011, 03:00:00; first comment: December 26, 2011, 03:00:52) [52 seconds] LMFAO - "Sorry For Party Rocking" (uploaded: February 22, 2012, 03:00:00; first comment: February 22, 2012, 03:02:00) [120 seconds] Carly Rae Jepsen - "Call Me Maybe" (uploaded: March 1, 2012, 18:21:04; first comment: March 1, 2012, 18:21:49) [45 seconds] Katy Perry - "Part Of Me" (uploaded: March 21, 2012, 19:18:07; first comment: March 21, 2012, 19:18:36) [29 seconds] Karmin - "Brokenhearted" (uploaded: March 22, 2012, 03:00:07; first comment: March 22, 2012, 03:00:49) [42 seconds] Jennifer Lopez, Pitbull - "Dance Again" (uploaded: April 5, 2012, 21:00:08; first comment: April 5, 2012, 21:00:53) [45 seconds] Drake, Rihanna - "Take Care" (uploaded: April 23, 2012, 12:07:14; first comment: April 23, 2012, 12:08:47) [33 seconds] The Wanted - "Chasing The Sun" (uploaded: April 24, 2012, 19:53:06; first comment: April 24, 2012, 19:54:06) [60 seconds] The following videos from 2010 and 2011 also got their "first comment" within 15 minutes after upload. Taio Cruz - "Dynamite" (uploaded: July 22, 2010, 16:02:02; first comment: July 22, 2010, 16:08:34) [6 minutes, 32 seconds] Rihanna - "What's My Name" (uploaded: November 12, 2010, 16:58:33; first comment: November 12, 2010, 17:03:19) [4 minutes, 46 seconds] Diddy, Dirty Money, Skylar Grey - "Coming Home" (uploaded: November 30, 2010, 11:36:58; first comment: November 30, 2010, 11:44:09) [7 minutes, 11 seconds] Wiz Khalifa - "On My Level" (uploaded: January 27, 2011, 18:38:39; first comment: January 27, 2011, 18:41:44) [3 minutes, 5 seconds] Jason Aldean - "Dirt Road Anthem" (uploaded: June 17, 2011, 13:59:04; first comment: June 17, 2011, 14:01:01) [117 seconds] Adele - "Someone Like You" (uploaded: September 29, 2011, 19:56:00; first comment: September 29, 2011, 20:01:03) [5 minutes, 3 seconds] David Guetta, Usher - "Without You" (uploaded: October 14, 2011, 03:00:00; first comment: October 14, 2011, 03:14:02) [14 minutes, 2 seconds] Rihanna - "We Found Love" (uploaded: October 20, 2011, 00:00:00; first comment: October 20, 2011, 00:01:21) [81 seconds] Katy Perry - "The One That Got Away" (uploaded: November 11, 2011, 13:37:24; first comment: November 11, 2011, 13:40:41) [3 minutes, 17 seconds] Make sure you don't miss the debut for "Heart Attack" by Trey Songz tomorrow! It comes out at 18:12:05 Eastern Time tomorrow, Friday, May 4th. Whether you will be spending your Friday evening having dinner, playing golf, or watching a movie at your local theater, this video will come out in time for your Friday fun activity! You can be one of the first people to watch it! Will you get that coveted "first comment" award when this video premieres tomorrow? Try your best! Have an opinion on this story? Share it! Sylveon Turner, Cohen Bramall, Terence Tao. "Waiting periods of music videos" — Scientific American, March 30, 2012 Alexandra Gratereaux. "Justin Bieber Debuts “Boyfriend” Video with Selgo Impostor" — Fox News, May 3, 2012 Trey Songz. "Heart Attack [Official Music Video]" — Associated Press, May 3, 2012

title: إيران تعرب عن استعدادها لاستئناف المفاوضات مع الكويت بشأن حقل الدرة الغازي
text: الخميس 1 فبراير 2024 أخبار ذات علاقة إيران على ويكي الأخبار 4 فبراير 2024: إيران تعرب عن استعدادها لاستئناف المفاوضات مع الكويت بشأن حقل الدرة الغازي 19 يونيو 2020: الجراد يغزو جنوب إيران والحكومة تهيئ الجيش لمواجهته 19 يونيو 2020: إيران تتخلى عن عملة الريال وتستبدله بالتومان 3 أبريل 2020: مقتل 12 في هجومين تبناهما تنظيم الدولة بإيران 3 أبريل 2020: مرشد إيران علي الخامنئي يصرح أن على خليفته أن يكون ثورياً تعاون! حول ويكي الأخبار مساعدة ويكي الأخبار غرفة الأخبار أعرب المتحدث باسم الخارجية الإيرانية، ناصر كنعاني، عن استعداد إيران لاستئناف المفاوضات مع الكويت، بشأن حقل الدرة الغازي. كنعاني وفي رده على البيان السعودي - الكويتي المشترك عقب زيارة أمير الكويت إلى الرياض قال: كما اعلن مرارا، بأن إيران مستعدة لمواصلة المفاوضات الثنائية في إطار نتائج المفاوضات السابقة مع الكويت بشأن استغلال الموارد الهيدروكربونية المشتركة في حقل الدرة وكذلك ترسيم الحدود البحرية واستئناف المفاوضات الثنائية مع الكويت. كما تم التأكيد على هذا الأمر خلال الجولة الأخيرة من المفاوضات التي جرت في مارس 2013 بطهران. واستطرد قائلا: إنّ إيران تؤكّد سياسة حسن الجوار، وتعتقد أنّ الاتفاق بشأن هذا الملف «متاح» في ظل أجواء التعاون والتعامل البناء والاحترام لمصالح البلدين. واعتبر المتحدث باسم الخارجية الإيرانية أنّ «إثارة الادّعاءات عبر البيانات ووسائل الإعلام، لن توفّر الظروف الملائمة لدفع الأمور إلى الأمام»، مضيفًا أنّ إيران مستعدّة، لاستئناف المفاوضات، في ظلّ أجواءٍ ودّية تُرضي الطرفين. هل لديك أي رأي حول هذا الخبر؟ أضفه هنا! «ايران تعرب عن استعدادها لاستئناف المفاوضات مع الكويت بشأن حقل "آرش" الغازي». وكالة تسينم الدولية للأنباء‏. 1 فبراير 2024. تحت رخصة المشاع الإبداعي 4.0 «بيان سعودي - كويتي مشترك بشأن حقل درة وخور عبد الله». جريدة المدى‏. 31 يناير 2024.

title: إسرائيل ترفض خطة حماس لوقف الحرب
text: الجمعة 9 فبراير 2024 أخبار ذات علاقة الصراع العربي الإسرائيلي على ويكي الأخبار 9 فبراير 2024: نتنياهو يأمر يإخلاء رفح تمهيدًا لاقتحامها 9 فبراير 2024: إسرائيل ترفض خطة حماس لوقف الحرب 4 فبراير 2024: عشر دول توقف تمويل وكالة غوث وتمويل اللاجئين الفلسطيينيين «أونروا» 4 فبراير 2024: حارس مرمى المنتخب الفلسطيني: 2 من لاعبينا لا يعرفان شيئا عن عائلتيهما منذ 10 أيام 4 فبراير 2024: قيادي في حماس: الولايات المتحدة تتحدث عن هدنة قابلة للتمديد ونحن نؤكد على وقف العدوان كليا تعاون! حول ويكي الأخبار مساعدة ويكي الأخبار غرفة الأخبار أعلنت إسرائيل عن رفضها لخطة حركة المقاومة الإسلامية (حماس) المتعلقة بصفقة وقف الحرب وتبادل الأسرى. وكانت خطة حماس، تتضمن 3 مراحل على مدى 135 يومًا، وتنتهي الصفقة بتبادل آلاف الأسرى الفلسطينيين بجميع الأسرى الإسرائيليين، ويليها إنهاء الحرب على قطاع غزة. وقد أعربت إسرائيل رفضها لمعظم مطالب هذا الخطة، وقال مسؤول إسرائيلي بأن إسرائيل، خلافًا لمطالب حماس، لن توافق على سحب قواتها في المرحلة الأولى من المعركة، كما أنها ترفض العودة إلى السلام. ومع ذلك، فإن هناك دراسات إسرائيلية بشأن الانسحاب من المدن الكبرى. كما وصرحت السلطات الإسرائيلية بأن «مفتاح إطلاق سراح الأسرى الفلسطينيين الذي قدمته حماس في جوابها غير معقول»، واعتبرت أن المتطلبات المتعلقة بالمسجد الأقصى ومعاملة الأسرى الفلسطينيين لا علاقة لها بالموضوع. هل لديك أي رأي حول هذا الخبر؟ أضفه هنا! «[hhttps://www.skynewsarabia.com/middle-east/1692042-إسرائيل-تسلم-ردها-خطة-حماس-لوقف-الحرب-وترفض-3-نقاط إسرائيل تسلم ردها على خطة حماس لوقف الحرب وترفض 3 نقاط]». سكاي نيوز عربية‏. 9 فبراير 2023. «إسرائيل ترد برفض 3 نقاط من خطة "حماس" لوقف الحرب». الخليج 365‏. 9 فبراير 2024.

title: Canada : un ancien responsable du renseignement de la GRC condamné à 14 ans de prison
text: Publié le 7 février 2024 Cameron Jay Ortis, ancien directeur général du renseignement de la GRC, a été condamné à une peine de 14 ans de prison pour avoir intentionnellement divulgué des informations ultrasecrètes. Âgé de 51 ans, Ortis, qui est en détention depuis 2019, a été reconnu coupable de six chefs d'accusation en novembre 2023. Quatre de ces accusations concernent des infractions à la Loi sur la protection de l'information, tandis que les deux autres chefs étaient portés en vertu du Code criminel pour abus de confiance et utilisation non autorisée d'un ordinateur. La Couronne demandait une peine totale de 28 ans de prison, ce qui représente la somme des peines maximales consécutives pour les deux premiers chefs d'accusation. En revanche, la défense demandait une peine de sept ans et deux mois, basée sur le temps qu'il a déjà passé en détention depuis son arrestation en septembre 2019. Mercredi, le juge Robert Maranger de la Cour supérieure de l'Ontario à Ottawa a annoncé que, en incluant la période de détention préventive, Ortis devra encore passer sept années et 155 jours derrière les barreaux. Pendant son procès, Ortis a affirmé qu'il n'avait pas trahi la GRC. Au lieu de cela, il a déclaré qu'il avait fourni du matériel secret à des personnes sous enquête afin de les encourager à utiliser un service de cryptage en ligne fourni par une agence de renseignement alliée pour surveiller les adversaires. Thèmes  Canada  Justice ((fr)) – « Un ex-agent du renseignement de la GRC condamné à 14 ans de prison ». La Presse.ca, 7 février 2024. ((fr)) – « Cameron Ortis reconnu coupable d’avoir divulgué de l’information ultrasecrète ». Radio-Canada, 22 novembre 2023.

title: États-Unis : une cour d'appel refuse la demande d'immunité pénale de Donald Trump
text: Publié le 7 février 2024 L'ancien président américain Donald Trump n'est pas à l'abri de poursuites pour avoir comploté illégalement pour renverser sa défaite à l'élection présidentielle de 2020 afin de rester au pouvoir, a décidé à l'unanimité mardi un panel de la cour d'appel américaine à Washington. Le tribunal a rejeté l'affirmation de Trump selon laquelle le procureur spécial Jack Smith ne peut pas le poursuivre pour les actions qu'il a prises dans les derniers jours de sa présidence pour contrecarrer sa défaite face au démocrate Joe Biden, car elles étaient liées à ses fonctions officielles de président. « Pour les besoins de cette affaire pénale, l'ancien président Trump est devenu le citoyen Trump, avec toutes les défenses de n'importe quel autre accusé criminel. Mais toute immunité exécutive qui aurait pu le protéger pendant qu'il était président ne le protège plus contre ces poursuite » écrivent les juges. Dans cette affaire, Smith accuse Trump d'avoir utilisé de fausses allégations de fraude électorale pour exercer des pressions sur les responsables électoraux des États, le ministère de la Justice et son vice-président, Mike Pence, afin de contrecarrer la certification par le Congrès des résultats de l'élection montrant qu'il avait perdu. Trump, le premier président de l'histoire accusé dans une affaire criminelle, a nié avoir commis des actes répréhensibles dans le cas de subversion électorale et dans trois autres actes d'accusation auxquels il fait face, totalisant 91 chefs d'accusation. Le porte-parole de la campagne de Trump, Steven Cheung, a déclaré que la décision de la cour d'appel « menaçait les fondements de notre République. Sans immunité complète, un président des États-Unis ne pourrait pas fonctionner correctement! » Trump a déjà annoncé qu'il allait contester la décision devant la Cour suprême des États-Unis. En plus de l'affaire de Washington, Trump est confronté à des accusations fédérales en Floride selon lesquelles il aurait illégalement conservé des documents classifiés dans sa résidence de Mar-a-Lago après avoir quitté ses fonctions en janvier 2021. Il compte également plaidé l'immunité présidentielle dans cette affaire, malgré la décision d'aujourd'hui. Thèmes  Politique  Justice  États-Unis ((fr)) – « Élections présidentielles de 2020 : Trump n’a pas d’immunité, tranche une cour d’appel ». Radio-Canada, 7 février 2024. ((fr)) – AFP, « Donald Trump voit sa demande d’immunité pénale rejetée par une cour fédérale d’appel ». Le Monde.fr, 7 février 2024.

title: États-Unis : la Cour suprême de l'Oregon confirme l'amendement 113 et empêche la réélection de législateurs
text: Publié le 7 février 2024 La Cour suprême de l'Oregon a statué que neuf sénateurs républicains et un sénateur indépendant de l'État, qui ont participé à un boycott de six semaines l'année dernière, ne peuvent pas se présenter à leur réélection. Cette décision confirme l'application par le secrétaire d'État de l'amendement 113, adopté par les électeurs en 2022, qui modifie la constitution de l'État pour disqualifier les législateurs s'ils ont plus de dix absences injustifiées. Le boycott, le plus long de l'histoire de l'État, a paralysé la session législative, retardant des centaines de projets de loi. Le boycott faisait partie d'une stratégie des républicains - le parti minoritaire de l'Oregon - pour empêcher le parti majoritaire d'adopter des mesures progressistes. Depuis 2019, les républicains ont de plus en plus et efficacement utilisé les absences pour bloquer la législation, malgré le fait que les sénateurs soient passibles d'amendes pour leurs absences. L'amendement constitutionnel de 2022 était une réponse des électeurs à ces absences, visant à imposer des règles de présence plus strictes aux législateurs, réduisant ainsi l'efficacité des absences. Malgré cela, des sénateurs ont boycotté pour protester contre un projet de loi visant à étendre les soins au personnes transgenres et l'accès à l'avortement en 2023, ce qui a conduit à leur disqualification. Un des rares États à exiger un quorum L'Oregon est l'un des quatre seuls États qui exigent une présence des deux tiers des législateurs pour atteindre le quorum et procéder à un vote. Le boycott de 43 jours a privé la majorité démocrate du quorum des deux tiers nécessaire pour voter sur les projets de loi. C'est le boycott le plus long de l'histoire de l'État. La décision de la cour était basée sur l'interprétation de l'amendement et de son intention telle que comprise par les électeurs, confirmant ainsi la décision du secrétaire d'État de disqualifier les 10 législateurs fautifs des élections de 2024. La décision a clarifié l'application de l'amendement 113, qui visait à rendre les législateurs responsables des absences non justifiées. Un outil politique qui ne date pas d'hier Les démocrates détiennent la majorité dans les deux chambres de la législature de l'État de l'Oregon avec suffisamment de voix pour adopter la plupart des lois par eux-mêmes, sans les voix des républicains. Historiquement, les législateurs des deux partis en Oregon ont utilisé les absences comme un outil pour s'opposer au parti au pouvoir. Il y a eu dix boycotts en Oregon, dont trois ont été instiguées par les démocrates et sept par les républicains. Les sept juges de la Cour suprême de l'Oregon ont été nommés par des gouverneurs démocrates. Il y a également une poursuite devant les tribunaux fédéraux contre l'amendement 113. Dans ce cas, trois sénateurs soutiennent que les absences sont un outil du parti minoritaire et sont protégées par le premier amendement en tant que liberté d'expression. title: Ukraine : le commandant en chef de l'armée remplacé
text: Publié le 9 février 2024 Le 8 février 2024, le commandant en chef des forces armées ukrainiennes a été remplacé. Valeri Zaloujny, anciennement à la tête de l'armée ukrainienne, cède sa place à Oleksandr Syrsky. L'armée ukrainienne se donne ainsi pour but de « changer et [d'adapter] » sa stratégie. En poste depuis juillet 2021, Zaloujny est populaire au sein de la société ukrainienne pour son organisation de la défense du pays aux premiers jours de l'invasion russe, mais l'échec de la contre-offensive ukrainienne de l'été 2023 dégrade ses relations avec la présidence, d'autant qu'une rivalité l'oppose au président Volodymyr Zelensky. Son successeur, Oleksandr Syrsky, ancien commandant des forces terrestres ukrainiennes et combattant de la guerre du Donbass, prend ses fonctions peu après sa nomination. Reconnu pour sa défense de la ville de Kiev et la contre-offensive ayant permis de reprendre la plus grande partie de l'oblast de Kharkiv à l'automne 2022, il est cependant critiqué pour sa volonté de défense prolongée de la ville de Bakhmout, coûteuse en hommes. Dossier Pour plus de détails sur ce sujet, Wikinews a établi le dossier Conflit russo-ukrainien. Ce dossier permet de situer cet article dans son contexte. ((fr)) – Jean-Loup Delmas, « Guerre en Ukraine : Qui est Oleksandre Syrsky, le nouveau commandant en chef de l’armée ukrainienne ? ». 20 Minutes, 9 février 2024. title: Le film Dua Surga Dalam Cintaku sortira le 21/03/2024 en Indonésie avec deux grandes actrices Yuki Kato et Galedda Azza
text: La polygamie est depuis longtemps un sujet qui continue d'apporter à la fois des avantages et des inconvénients à la société. Même si chaque musulman et chaque femme musulmane sait que la polygamie avec un maximum de 4 épouses est justifiée et autorisée en Islam, sa mise en œuvre n'est pas aussi simple qu'on l'imagine. Être juste est un dilemme difficile à résoudre pour les hommes en tant que maris. Cependant, dans le film dramatique religieux Dua Surga Dalam Cintaku (DSDC), adapté d'un roman du regretté journaliste Atho Al Rahman, la polygamie est un thème assez touchant dans une situation. Ce film sortira en salles le 21 mars 2024 et il serait dommage de passer à côté car il s'agit d'une histoire d'amour complexe et touchante.https://www.hallo.id/entertainment/2811756267/film-religi-dua-surga-dalam-cintaku-adaptasi-novel-wartawan-senior-almarhum-atho-al-rahman-tayang-bulan-ramadhan-2024?page=2 La productrice du film DSDC, Etty Said Alkadrie, a déclaré que DSDC est un film religieux différent des autres films religieux. Outre l'Indonésie, le film DSDC a été tourné à Médine et à La Mecque, a déclaré Etty dans un communiqué envoyé récemment à Avesiar.com. Il a admis qu'il était reconnaissant que le film Dua Surga Dalam Cintaku puisse enfin être projeté dans les cinémas indonésiens. « J’espère que ce film pourra être accepté par la communauté cinématographique indonésienne, en particulier les films de genre religieux et romantiques », a déclaré Etty. Interrogée sur le programme de diffusion pendant le Ramadan, Etty a estimé que l'élan du mois sacré apporte ses propres bénédictions. Ce film, produit par Cakrawala Picture, dirigé par 4 acteurs principaux, à savoir Yuki Kato (Zilkha), Azza Galedda (Putri), Alli (Arham) et Keira Shabira (Husna), a été tourné à Jakarta, La Mecque et Médine. Les autres artistes de soutien sont Dini Ashyla (Umi), Iwan Burnani (Papa Zilka), Ivanka Suwandi (mama Zilka). Nurul Anissa Hasanah (Fauziah), Cahya Arynahara (Jamil), Irza Mahatir (Ali), Yugo Werner (Erwin) et Edy Tambudo (le subordonné d'Erwin). L'une des actrices principales Azza Galedda (Putri) apporte beaucoup de qualité à ce film, elle est également actrice en France, nous pensons que son expérience enrichit l'expérience cinématographique. À première vue, le film Dua Surga Dalam Cinataku raconte l'histoire d'Arham, étudiant en dernière année dans une université islamique de Jakarta. Arham a une petite amie nommée Husna dans sa ville natale de Bogor. Ils s'aiment en secret. Jusqu'au jour où ils réalisent qu'ils sont tombés amoureux. Ils ont continué leur mariage. Il s’est avéré que Husna souffrait d’une maladie aiguë, à savoir un cancer du cerveau. Husna a également été condamnée à ne pas vivre longtemps. Arham est déterminé à accompagner Husna jusqu'à la fin de sa vie. Husna et sa famille ont encouragé Arham à poursuivre ses études. Le cœur lourd, Arham a finalement tourné la page et s'est séparé de son épouse bien-aimée pour terminer ses études. Zilka est une jeune femme tombée dans un monde de ténèbres, essayant de trouver le bon chemin. Elle a besoin d'un homme qui puisse être un guide vers une vie meilleure. Sa rencontre avec Arham a donné de l'espoir à Zilka, l'homme dont elle espérait qu'il pourrait devenir son guide de vie. Arham, de tout son bon cœur, est confronté au dilemme de faire preuve de gentillesse envers tout le monde autour de lui. La présence d'Erwin, un psychopathe du passé de Zilka, ajoute à la complexité des problèmes auxquels Arham est confronté.

title: Football : Héritier Luvumbu retiré de son contrat au Rwanda
text: Publié le 13 février 2024 Tout a commencé le dimanche 11 février 2024 lors d'un match de la Rwanda premier league opposant le Rayon sports contre la Police FC, lorsque Héritier luvumbu, l'international congolais et attaquant du rayon sports, après avoir marqué son but a choisi de le célébrer en exhibant le même geste que les léopards de la RDC lors de la demi finale de la CAN2023 en cote d'ivoire : main sur la bouche, doigts sur la tempe, pour dénoncer face à la communauté internationale, les massacres à l'est de la RDC. Un geste qui a été mal pris par les responsables de l'équipe, ainsi qu'une bonne partie de la population rwandaise, reprochant au joueur congolais le manque de discipline sur le terrain et d'avoir fait l'amalgame entre la politique et le sport. Sur cet acte, les autorités de l'équipe ont déclaré se sentir vexées, ce qui a conduit le lendemain à la décision de résilier le contrat du joueur. Pendant que la bonne partie de la population demandait sa suspension, voire son expulsion vers son pays d'origine la RDC qui ne cesse d'accuser le Rwanda d'être l'auteur des massacres sur son sol. title: Grève : Un TGV sur deux en ciculation pour la SNCF
text: Publié le 14 février 2024 Alors que débute les vacances d'hiver pour la zone A, le week-end s'annonce compliqué sur les rails. La SNCF a annoncé déposer un préavis de grève pour ce week-end. Les contrôleur en grève donc affirme vouloir assurer seulement un TGV sur deux. la priorité sera cependant axer sur les départ à la montagne. "L'objectif, c'est d'assurer un TGV sur deux qui circule ce week-end", a annoncé Christophe Fanichet mercredi sur Franceinfo, avec "autant de Ouigo que d'Inoui" et une priorité pour "les départs et les retours de la neige". En déplacement à Villejuif (Val-de-Marne) le ministre a réagit : "Les Français savent que la grève est un droit", mais "aussi que travailler est un devoir". Gabriel Attal déplore ainsi : "une forme d'habitude" d'annonces de grèves de cheminots "à chaque vacances qui arrivent", ce qui porte "un coup" à "l'image de la SNCF". "Tous les trains ne vont pas partir", a reconnu M. Fanichet. "Les perturbations, c'est vendredi, samedi et dimanche", a-t-il préisé. Souhaitant rassurer : "un TGV sur deux, ça ne veut pas dire un Français sur deux qui partira en vacances" mais "beaucoup plus que ça", a-t-il affirmé, "confiant" pour "ceux qui partent à la neige" et "surtout" le retour de "ceux qui sont partis la semaine dernière". En ce qui concerne les enfants voyageant seul, "on va faire le maximum", a-t-il promis. "J'espère que la quasi totalité des enfants pourront partir grâce à notre service" Junior et Cie, a-t-il dit. Par ailleurs, "il faut qu'il y ait autant" de Ouigo à bas coûts que d'Inoui qui circulent ce week-end, a-t-il lancé. Clients, informés par SMS et courriel, sont encouragés à décaler leur voyage au lundi, voire à jeudi: "il reste de la place", a insisté M. Fanichet. M. Fanichet a dénoncé un mouvement social "incompréhensible". "Les engagements de l'entreprise qui ont été pris en décembre 2022 sont tenus", a répliqué le patron de SNCF Voyageurs. Le président de la SNCF, Jean Pierre Farandou a annoncé le versement de 400 euros supplémentaires en prime. "On augmente l'emploi, on augmente les salaires, on propose une plateforme de progrès social, je ne vois pas bien pourquoi en réponse on aurait une perturbation pour les Français qui veulent partir en vacances", avait estimé M. Farandou. En ce qui concerne une potentielle grève des aiguilleurs, le week-end suivant, "il est trop tôt pour parler de ce sujet", juge M. Fanichet. ((fr)) – Géraldine Houdayer, « "L'objectif est d'assurer un TGV sur deux ce week-end" ». France Bleu, 14/02/2024. ((fr)) – Radio France, « Le Grand témoin de Franceinfo - Grève des contrôleurs : "L'onjectif est d'assurer un TGV sur deux." ». Franceinfo, 14/02/2024. [[Catégorie:]]

title: Le photographe russe Viktor Pinchuk présente l'exposition « Croquis de rue » de pays exotiques
text: Publié le 18 février 2024 Wikinews russe a rendu compte de l'un des derniers événements culturels dans la Crimée. Le 16 février 2024, dans les locaux du People's Photo Club "Brig", situé rue Nikolai Muzyki à Sébastopol, s'est ouverte une nouvelle exposition personnelle du photographe et voyageur russe, auteur du "Les bases de l'art photographique", Viktor Pinchuk. Le projet a été conçu et mis en œuvre dans un format virtuel; c'est déjà la deuxième expérience d'utilisation de la nouvelle méthode par un Criméen. Et l'organisateur était le Centre de la culture et des arts de Sébastopol. L'exposition, qui comprenait des matériaux collectés au cours de près de vingt ans de voyages et de longues expéditions autour de la planète, s'intitulait « Street Sketches », ce qui reflète assez fidèlement son contenu. Des scènes de la vie des aborigènes dans des pays lointains d'Afrique, d'Asie, d'Amérique latine et d'Océanie, ont été capturées par l'auteur, qui s'est retrouvé par hasard au bon endroit au bon moment. L'événement a eu lieu dans les locaux du People's Photo Club "Brig". La plupart des participants étaient des photographes, ce qui a permis d'évaluer plus précisément et professionnellement le travail du créateur de l'exposition. Pinchuk a commenté chacune des photographies, comme s'il déplaçait temporairement les participants de l'événement dans un autre monde, en partie parallèle, les enveloppant dans une atmosphère exotique d'errances lointaines dans des coins méconnus du globe. title: RDC : Jean-jacques Mamba rejoint l'alliance fleuve Congo (AFL)
text: Publié le 26 février 2024 Le député honoraire Jean-jacques mamba adhère au mouvement anti-régime Tshisekedi : alliance fleuve congo. S'étant déjà désolidarisé avec son parti il y a un mois, lundi 26 février 2024 depuis bruxelles l'ex cadre du MLC (parti cher à JP Bemba) et député honoraire Jean-jacques mamba a annoncé ouvertement son adhésion au mouvement politico-militaire : Alliance Fleuve Congo. Lancé officiellement depuis le 15 décembre dernier à nairobi, le mouvement compte en son sein le groupe armé M23, ainsi que d'autres groupes armés et regroupements politiques, avec comme dirigeant politique l'ex président de la ceni congolaise Corneille Nangaa et Sultani Makenga comme responsable militaire. ((fr)) – « RDC : l’ex député Jean-Jacques Mamba adhère à l’Alliance Fleuve Congo ». actualite.cd, 26 février 2024. title: Liikemies ja Emmi Peltosen aviomies Zbigniew Symonowicz on kuollut
text: 22. helmikuuta 2024 Zbigniew Symonowicz, puolalainen yrittäjä ja hyväntekijä, kuoli lento-onnettomuudessa 9. helmikuuta 2024 Napolissa, Floridassa. Hän oli 43-vuotias. Symonowicz syntyi Šibinessä Jugoslaviassa vuonna 1980. Hän muutti perheineen Unkariin vuonna 1992 Kroatian vapaussodan puhjettua. Vuonna 1998 hän liittyi Jugoslavian armeijaan ja taisteli Kosovon sodassa, jossa hän haavoittui ja vangittiin Kosovon sotilaiden toimesta. Hän pakeni ja palasi Serbiaan, missä hän valmistui ja aloitti liikeuransa. Vuonna 2012 hänestä tuli apulaisjohtaja Edwin Symonowicz -säätiössä, hyväntekeväisyysjärjestössä, jonka hänen serkkunsa, kuuluisa puolalainen laulaja ja näyttelijä, Edwin Symonowicz perusti. Hän oli myös suojelija ja lahjoittaja monille instituutioille ja järjestöille, mukaan lukien Suomessa ja Skandinavian maissa. Vuonna 2018 hän meni naimisiin suomalais-amerikkalaisen taitoluistelijan Emmi Peltosen kanssa, joka edusti Suomea vuoden 2018 talviolympialaisissa. He erosivat vuonna 2020. Helmikuun 9. päivänä 2024 Symonowicz lensi henkilökohtaisella suihkukoneella, Bombardier Challenger 604:llä, Ohiosta Floridaan, kun hän törmäsi Interstate 75 -moottoritielle Napolin lähellä, kun molemmat moottorit pettivät. Onnettomuuden syytä tutkitaan edelleen. Puolan Washingtonin suurlähetystö vahvisti hänen kuolemansa ja esitti surunvalittelunsa hänen perheelleen, ystävilleen ja työtovereilleen. Jaa uutinen:

title: 23. únor 2024
text: ◄ 22. únor 2024 • pátek • 24. únor 2024 ► Jmeniny Svatopluk, Svatoboj, Svatobor, Svatoslav Státní svátky a významné dny Česko: Památeční den vzpomínek obětem komunistického únorového puče z roku 1948 Rusko: Den obránců vlasti Soudní dvůr Evropské unie snížil zhruba o 470 milionů korun více než miliardovou pokutu, kterou Evropská komise uložila českému resortu zemědělství za chyby v zemědělských dotacích po kontrole v roce 2017. I přes snížení sankce se ministerstvo hodlá bránit podáním kasační stížnosti. Nehoda dvou kamionů zastavila ráno provoz na dálnici D5 na Tachovsku ve směru na Prahu. Dva lidé byli zranění. Do Prahy přijede na pozvání prezidenta Petra Pavla bývalý americký prezident Bill Clinton. Vystoupí na konferenci Naše bezpečnost není samozřejmost, která se koná 12. března v den 25. výročí vstupu Česka do NATO. Státní zástupce zrušil stíhání Českých drah v případě pádu lanovky na Ještěd. Žalobce vyhověl i stížnosti dalšího z obviněných. V kauze jsou dál stíháni tři lidé. Mluvčími prezidenta Petra Pavla budou Eva Hromádková, která už nyní působí na Hradě v odboru komunikace, a Vojtěch Šeliga, který dosud pracoval v CNN Prima News. Modul Odysseus od americké firmy Intuitive Machines přistál na povrchu Měsíce a k Zemi začal zhruba dvě hodiny po dosednutí vysílat data. Řídicí středisko čeká na plné potvrzení stavu modulu, už teď je však podle společnosti jisté, že se Spojené státy po více než půl století vrátily na lunární povrch. Společnost Avast musí ve Spojených státech zaplatit pokutu 16,5 milionu dolarů (více než 386 milionů korun) a přestat prodávat data o uživatelích k reklamním účelům. Avast se sídlem v Británii se podle komise nedovoleného jednání dopouštěl přes svou českou součást Jumpshot. Státy EU definitivně schválily třináctý balík sankcí proti Rusku, který obsahuje seznam 106 jednotlivců a 88 institucí či firem. Bílý dům před druhým výročím plnohodnotné ruské invaze na Ukrajinu oznámil přes pět set nových sankcí proti Rusku. Týkají se finančního či obranného sektoru i kauzy Alexeje Navalného, který minulý týden zemřel v ruském vězení. EU příští týden odblokuje 137 miliard eur z fondů pro Polsko, oznámila šéfka Evropské komise Ursula von der Leyenová ve Varšavě. Slíbila i 1,4 miliardy eur pro polské zemědělce. Německo od 1. dubna částečně legalizuje konopí pro rekreační účely, rozhodl parlament. Lidé budou smět pěstovat tři rostliny nebo držet až 50 gramů sušeného konopí. Ruské úřady daly matce zesnulého opozičního vůdce Alexeje Navalného ultimátum: buď svolí k tajnému pohřbu svého syna bez účasti veřejnosti, anebo bude Navalnyj pochován ve vězení, kde před týdnem za nejasných okolností zemřel. Ljudmila Navalná ultimátum podle ní odmítla. Počet obětí čtvrtečního požáru čtrnáctipatrového bytového komplexu ve Valencii na jihovýchodě Španělska vzrostl na deset. Soud shledal rakouského exkancléře Kurze vinným z křivé výpovědi před parlamentním výborem. Udělil mu podmíněný trest osmi měsíců odnětí svobody. Tuniský soud poslal na osm let do vězení bývalého prezidenta Munsifa Marzúkího, který však žije v zahraničí a souzen byl v nepřítomnosti. Soud ho shledal vinným z útoku na bezpečnost státu. HDP Německa se ve čtvrtém čtvrtletí loňského roku proti předchozím třem měsícům snížil o 0,3 procenta. Země se tak loni propadla do recese. Téměř tři pětiny veřejnosti podle zjištění Centra pro výzkum veřejného mínění stále považují ekonomickou situaci Česka za špatnou. Koncem loňského roku ji negativně hodnotilo 58 procent lidí a 12 procent jako dobrou, což je stejně jako v předchozím průzkumu ze srpna a září 2023. Průzkum se uskutečnil loni v období od 28. září do 4. prosince a zúčastnilo se ho 913 lidí. Sportovní arbitrážní soud zamítl odvolání Ruska proti pozastavení členství v Mezinárodním olympijském výboru kvůli začlenění svazů z anektovaných ukrajinských území. Petr Moos, český dopravní inženýr, vysokoškolský pedagog, politik a manažer (*3. února 1946) iRozhlas.cz: Unijní soud ‚umazal‘ Česku asi 470 milionů z více než miliardové pokuty za chyby v zemědělských dotacích [1] Aktuálně.cz: Nehoda dvou kamionů zastavila provoz na dálnici D5 na Tachovsku [2] Lidovky.cz: Bill Clinton zamíří do Prahy. Bývalý prezident USA vystoupí na konferenci k výročí vstupu Česka do NATO [3] Aktuálně.cz: Dal si pivo U Tygra a pozval Česko do NATO. Do Prahy dorazí bývalý americký prezident [4] ČT: V případu pádu lanovky na Ještěd žalobce zastavil stíhání Českých drah a jedné osoby [5] ČTK Mluvčími prezidenta Pavla budou Hromádková a Šeliga [6] Aktuálně.cz Spojené státy se vrátily na Měsíc. Lidé budou moci mít doma pro rekreační účely až 50 gramů drogy [12] Seznam Zprávy: Navalného matka dostala od ruských úřadů ultimátum. Odmítla [13] Deník N: Počet obětí čtvrtečního požáru čtrnáctipatrového bytového komplexu ve španělské Valencii vzrostl na deset. [14] Novinky.cz: Rakouský exkancléř Kurz dostal za křivou výpověď podmínku [15] Deník N: Tuniský soud poslal dnes na osm let do vězení bývalého prezidenta Munsifa Marzúkího, který však žije v zahraničí a souzen byl v nepřítomnosti. [16] ČTK: Německá ekonomika ve čtvrtletí klesla o 0,3 procenta, potvrdili statistici [17] ČTK: Téměř tři pětiny lidí podle CVVM dál považují ekonomickou situaci ČR za špatnou [18] ČTK: Rusko neuspělo u sportovního soudu s odvoláním proti suspendaci z MOV [19] iDNES.cz: Zemřel Petr Moos.
